name: A Crazy Skater Boy - Extreme Skateboard Stunts Edition
name_original: A Crazy Skater Boy - Extreme Skateboard Stunts Edition
description:
** CRAZY FUN SKATEBOARD GAME! **

Get ready for a fun, wild ride! It's time to get a little crazy with the latest skateboard game to hit the streets!

FEATURES

- Lots of fun obstacles to avoid and jump over.
- Fun soundtrack with lots of funny sound effects.
